errorInfo.title: Unclosed Span
errorInfo.message: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing ']' for the span or link.

notes.message: This is the opening bracket for the span
notes.label: span-start

errorInfo.title: Mismatched Delimiter in Attribute Specifier
errorInfo.message: I expected a '}', language specifier, an identifier, a class specifier, or a key-value pair.

notes.message: The attribute specifier starts here.
notes.label: attribute-start

errorInfo.title: Key-value Pair Before Class Specifier in Attribute
errorInfo.message: This class specifier appears after the key-value pair.

notes.message: This key-value pair cannot appear before the class specifier.
notes.label: key-value

errorInfo.title: Unclosed Emphasis
errorInfo.message: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '_' for the emphasis.

notes.message: This is the opening delimiter for the emphasis
notes.label: emphasis-start

errorInfo.title: Unclosed Single Quote
errorInfo.message: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing "'" for the quote.

notes.message: This is the opening quote. If you need an apostrophe, escape it with a backslash.
notes.label: quote-start

errorInfo.title: Unclosed emphasis
errorInfo.message: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing _ for the emphasis.

notes.message: (Emphasis start) If you meant an underscore, escape it with a backslash.
notes.label: emph-start

errorInfo.title: Unsupported Code Block Syntax
errorInfo.message: Quarto Markdown requires executable code block options in YAML.

notes.message: use a YAML block syntax in a comment with `|`.
notes.label: invalid-attr

errorInfo.title: Unclosed Single Quote
errorInfo.message: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing "'" for the quote.

notes.message: This is the opening quote. If you need an apostrophe, escape it with a backslash.
notes.label: quote-start

errorInfo.title: Closed Quote Without Matching Open Quote
errorInfo.message: A space is causing a quote mark to be interpreted as a quotation close.

notes.message: This is the opening quote. If you need an apostrophe, escape it with a backslash.
notes.label: quote-start
